title: The Space between words: family (TEFC)
creator_credit: Roger Graef, KCET (Television station : Los Angeles, Calif.) and BBC-TV
brief_description: Families go for years without a serious talk of any kind. When crisis comes they may discover they have not really understood one another. A mother finds that her divorce began a series of problems with her teenage son. The family tries to discover how these difficulties developed, helped by a family therapist - Dr. Aaron Esterson.
